attributes.action: Ban the sale of tickets on eBay.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Having spent 3 gruelling hours on the first day of sale trying to purchase Take That tickets via Ticketmaster website (sadly and disappointingly to no avail), I stumbled through eBay to find tickets are being sold for hundreds of pounds, in London thousands!! People should STOP selling tickets on eBay for their own profit and let genuine people have a chance to purchase them via authorised means. Live 8 was a prime example how people made money on tickets in which the sale of tickets via authorised sites was for charity, yet on eBay for the greedy eBay sellers profits.  It is time we stopped these ticket hungry, profit orientated people and ban the sale of tickets on eBay.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
